QuestData.Title: Home Sweet Gnome
QuestData.Description: I used t' have quite the home back in Ironforge. That is, I did until I was booted out to make way for the gnomes.$B$BThey couldn't stop a bunch of troggs with all them gizmos and machines! An' I have to pay for their weakness?$B$BNo, sir. No longer.$B$BGo to Gnomeregan and talk to Commando Murd Doc. Sure, he's a gnome, but his crew, S.A.F.E. I think they call 'em, are going to take Gnomeregan back.$B$BGo! I want my house back!
QuestData.RewardText: Never thought I'd see a $r like you down here. Any particular reason you're risking life and limb?
